scripts.build:svg: [ "$(ls -A $npm_config_svgsrcdir)" ] && (svg-sprite-generate -d $npm_config_svgsrcdir -o $npm_config_svgdestpath && echo "Wrote SVG to $npm_config_svgdestpath") || echo "No SVG source files in $npm_config_svgsrcdir"
scripts.watch:styles: ( if [ ! -f $npm_config_sassdestdir/style.css ]; then npm run build:styles; fi) && node-sass -w --source-comments --output-style expanded -o $npm_config_sassdestdir $npm_config_sasssrcdir
scripts.build:styles: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.watch:all: npm run watch:svg & npm run watch:scripts & npm run watch:styles & npm run watch:autoprefixer
scripts.build:all: npm run build:svg && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles
scripts.start: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
